title: $H_3$-graded groups
abstract:
Using the well-known realisation of the root system $ H_3 $ as a folding of $
D_6 $, one can construct examples of $ H_3 $-graded groups from Chevalley
groups of type $ D_6 $. Such Chevalley groups are defined over a commutative
ring $ R $, and the root groups of the resulting $ H_3 $-grading are
coordinatised by $ R \times R $. We show that every $ H_3 $-graded group arises
as the folding of a $ D_6 $-graded group, or in other words, that it is
coordinatised by $ R \times R $ for some commutative ring $ R $.
